snippet: Everett Golson said he was leaving Notre Dame to use his final season of eligibility elsewhere.
abstract: Notre Dame quarterback Everett Golson announces he is leaving the program to use his final season of eligibility elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Everett Golson said he was leaving Notre Dame to use his final season of eligibility elsewhere.
